name: auto-todo
description: A complete todo application with CRUD operations, search functionality, and robust delete handling

scripts.test:browser: echo 'Open test-delete-unit-tests.html in your browser to run unit tests'
scripts.test:integration: echo 'Open test-delete-functionality.html in your browser to run integration tests'
scripts.start: echo 'Open index.html in your browser to run the AutoToDo application'
scripts.test:all: npm run test && echo '\nTo run browser tests, open test-delete-unit-tests.html and test-delete-functionality.html in your browser'

author: AutoToDo Team
